ya2.1.2:2.1: Piyarūpaṁ sātarūpaṁ rūpaṁ, na rūpakkhandho. Rūpakkhandho rūpañceva rūpakkhandho ca.
ya2.1.2:7.1: Diṭṭhisaññā saññā, na saññākkhandho. Saññākkhandho saññā ceva saññākkhandho ca.
ya2.1.2:10.1: Saṅkhārakkhandhaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā saṅkhārā, na saṅkhārakkhandho. Saṅkhārakkhandho saṅkhārā ceva saṅkhārakkhandho ca.
ya2.1.2:16.1: Piyarūpaṁ sātarūpaṁ na rūpakkhandho, rūpaṁ. Rūpañca rūpakkhandhañca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva rūpaṁ na ca rūpakkhandho.
ya2.1.2:21.1: Diṭṭhisaññā na saññākkhandho, saññā. Saññañca saññākkhandhañca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva saññā na ca saññākkhandho.
ya2.1.2:24.1: Saṅkhārakkhandhaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā na saṅkhārakkhandho, saṅkhārā. Saṅkhāre ca saṅkhārakkhandhañca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva saṅkhārā na ca saṅkhārakkhandho.
